    def c35, 0.0078125, 0, 0, 0
    def c34, 0.5, 65280, 255, -32768
    def c33, 1, -1, 0, 2
    def c29, 1, 0, 0, 0
    def c30, 0, 1, 0, 0
    def c31, 0, 0, 1, 0
    def c32, 0, 0, 0, 1
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_texcoord o0.xyz
    dcl_texcoord1 o1
    dcl_texcoord2 o2.xy
    dcl_texcoord4 o3.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 o4
    dcl_texcoord6 o5
    dcl_texcoord7 o6
    dcl_position o7

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mul r0, c25.wwyy, v0.xyxy
    mad r1, r0.yxxy, c33.xxyy, c33.zzxx
    add r2, r1, r1
    add r0.x, v0.y, v0.x
    slt r0.x, c25.z, r0.x
    slt r0.y, v0.x, v0.y
    mad r0.x, r0.x, c33.w, r0.y
    mad r1, r1, -c33.w, c33.x
    mul r1, r1, c26
    mad r1, r2, c25.x, r1
    mova a0.x, r0.x
    dp4 r0.x, r1, c29[a0.x]
    frc r0.y, r0.x
    add r0.x, -r0.y, r0.x
    mov r1, c29
    if_lt c25.x, r1.x
      add r2.x, r0.y, -c24.x
      add r2.y, r0.x, c29.x
      mul r2.x, r2.y, r2.x
      add_sat r2.x, r2.x, r2.x

      add r0.y, r0.y, -c24.x
      mul_sat r2.x, r0.y, c24.y
    endif
    exp r0.y, -r0.x
    mad r3.xy, c27.x, r0.y, -r1.x
    add r0.y, -r0.x, -c29.x
    exp r0.y, r0.y
    mul r0.y, r0.y, c27.x
    max r0.y, r0.y, c33.w
    add r3.zw, r0.y, -c29.x
    mul r3, r3, c27.y
    mad r4, r0.zwzw, r3, c34.x
    frc r5, r4
    add r4, r4, -r5
    rcp r0.y, r3.y
    mul r3.xy, r0.y, r4
    mad r0.yz, r3.xxyw, c21.xxyw, c21.xzww
    mov r4.xy, c21
    mad r5.xy, r4, c34.x, r0.yzzw
    add r5.w, r0.x, -c24.z
    mov r5.z, c29.w
    texldl r0, r5, s0
    mul r0.xy, r0, c34.yzzw
    add r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
    add r0.x, r0.x, c34.w
    mul r3.z, r0.x, c35.x
    rcp r0.x, r3.w
    mul r0.xy, r0.x, r4.zwzw
    mad r2.yz, r0.xxyw, c21.xxyw, c21.xzww
    mad r6.xy, r4, c34.x, r2.yzzw
    add r6.zw, r5, c29.xyyx
    texldl r5, r6, s0
    mul r2.yz, r5.xxyw, c34
    add r0.w, r2.z, r2.y
    add r0.w, r0.w, c34.w
    mul r0.z, r0.w, c35.x
    lrp r5.xyz, r2.x, r0, r3
    mul r0, r5.y, c7
    mad r0, c6, r5.x, r0
    mad r0, c8, r5.z, r0
    add r0, r0, c9
    add r2.xyz, -r0, c28
    mul r3.xyz, r2.y, c15
    mad r3.xyz, c14, r2.x, r3
    mad o3.xyz, c16, r2.z, r3
    mul o4.xyz, r2, c28.w

    mad r2, c0, r0.x, r2
    mad r2, c2, r0.z, r2
    mad r2, c3, r0.w, r2
    mul r3.x, r2.w, c17.z
    mad r2.xy, r3.x, c17, r2
    mad r3.xy, r5, c21, c21.zwzw

    mad r3.xy, r5, c22, c22.wzzw
    mad o2.xy, r3, c23, c23.wzzw
    mad r1, c18.xyzx, r1.xxxw, r1.yyzx
    add r1, r0, -r1
    mul r3.xy, r1.y, c11
    mad r1.xy, c10, r1.x, r3

    mad r1.xy, c13, r1.w, r1
    add r1.xy, -r1, c19

    dp3 o1.w, r1, c20
    mad r0.xyz, r0, -c4.w, c4
    mul r1.xyz, r0.y, c15
    mad r0.xyw, c14.xyzz, r0.x, r1.xyzz

    mov o0.z, c29.w

    mov o6, r2
